channel.title: Holiday on Cakes By Cassidy
channel.description: Recent content in Holiday on Cakes By Cassidy

item.title: Treat Yourself to These Christmas Desserts
item.description: section.container img { width: 400px; } With the holidays fast approaching, I thought it’d be a great idea to share with you two of my family’s favorite Christmas desserts. It is so important to come together during the holidays and spend time with your loved ones making everlasting memories. During this busy time of year I look for simple and easy ideas that will both bring the holiday spirit into my home- while remaining as hassle free as possible.
